sql.name: formdreamnet.title
sql.item: select distinct c801800003 from {100} where c801800002='梦网类' and c801800001='投诉'

sql.name: formdreamnet.left
sql.item: select ty.业务类型1 as 业务类型, ty.业务类型2 as 业务类型, ty.业务类型3 as 业务类型, ty.隐藏列 as 隐藏列 from ( select 业务类型1,业务类型2,业务类型3,隐藏列,dd from ( select distinct '梦网投诉统计' as 业务类型1 ,type.c801800004 as 业务类型2,type.c801800005 as 业务类型3, (type.c801800004||'.'||type.c801800005) as 隐藏列 ,max(type.c801800007) as dd from {100} type where type.c801800002='梦网类' and type.c801800001='投诉' group by type.c801800004,type.c801800005 ) order by dd ) ty

sql.name: formdreamnet.number
sql.item:
select distinct
(y.c801800004||'.'||y.c801800005) as 隐藏列, y.C801800003 as 二级业务类型, count(distinct t.C1) as 工单数量 from {100} t,{800} y,(select * from {400} union all select * from {700}) pro,{300} u,{500} g,{600} gu where y.c801800006=t.c801000003 and t.C1=pro.C700020001 and t.C700000005=u.C630000001 and u.C1=gu.C620000028 and gu.C620000027=g.C1 {6} {5} {8} {3} and y.c801800002='梦网类' and y.c801800001='投诉' group by y.c801800003,y.C801800004,y.c801800005
